text: Lisa Sparxxx (October 6, 1977) was born in Bowling Green, Kentucky. She is an American pornographic actress, director, producer and model with a career spanning over two decades since 2000. ==Biography== ===Early life=== Sparxxx was born in Portsmouth, Virginia, and was raised in Kentucky. She attended Western Kentucky University where she earned a BS in Sport Marketing with a minor in psychology, followed by an MS in Sport Marketing and Branding from the same institution. ===Career=== She began her career in 2000 when she and her husband, Jeff Hansen, launched a website featuring automotive-themed content. Her first professional work was for Reality Kings' BigNaturals.com. She has since appeared in over 500 films and worked with major production companies including Hustler, Vivid, and Adam & Eve. Apart from casting, she has directed and produced films, including but not limited to "Assault My Ass" and "The Head Clinic," which received industry recognition, including AVN award pre-nominations. She co-hosted a radio show on KSEX Radio called "Recipes for Sex." Her media appearances include Howard Stern's radio show, Playboy TV and radio, Season 2 of The Surreal Life, and Spike Television's Manswers. She also appeared in hip-hop artist Murs' music video for "Risky Business." === Business ventures === With her husband Jeff, she founded and operates LisaSparxxx.com, a production company. They previously owned Adult Stars Pass (later rebranded as SparxxxCash), a web development affiliate enterprise managing multiple adult websites. In 2007, she was named Booble Girl of the Year. === Personal life === Sparxxx married her husband Jeff S. Hansen (Justin Case) in August 12, 1995, after graduating from high school. They have maintained both their marriage and business partnership since 1995. They have one child who graduated from college. == Controversy == ===World Gangbang Championship controversy=== In October 2004, Sparxxx participated in what was advertised as the "Third Annual World Gangbang Championship" at the Eroticon 2004 convention in Warsaw, Poland. While initial reports claimed she had sexual encounters with 919 men over 22 hours, Sparxxx later stated the event actually involved approximately 150 participants over a 7.5-hour period. The event generated significant political controversy in Poland. Warsaw Mayor Lech Kaczy≈Ñski publicly opposed it and declared it illegal just days before its scheduled date. The city authorities cited public safety concerns, particularly the lack of medical screening for participants. The event organizer, Pink Press, defended the gathering as a film shoot rather than a public event, claiming all participants were paid actors with contracts. This followed a pattern of similar controversy from the previous year's event, where performer Marianna Rokita had participated in a similar performance with reported 759 partners over eight hours. The Warsaw authorities threatened legal action against both the organizers and the venue owners, citing laws regarding mass events and public safety. These official pressures led to the event being relocated from the convention to an undisclosed warehouse location. Despite widespread media coverage claiming this constituted a Guinness World Record, there is no official verification from Guinness World Records regarding this achievement. The discrepancy between reported numbers (919) and Sparxxx's account (around 150) has never been officially resolved. The event's relocation and scaling down due to legal threats likely contributed to this discrepancy. In later statements, Sparxxx expressed regret about her participation in the event, describing it as the only performance in her career that was motivated solely by financial considerations. She has publicly distanced herself from claims about record-breaking numbers, maintaining that the event was significantly smaller than reported in contemporary media coverage. The controversy highlighted tensions between Poland's adult entertainment industry and local authorities during this period. ==Filmography== ===Films=== * Babes in Pornland 18: White Trash Babes
